```js
<html>
<head>
 <title>Real-Time 3D Graphics with WebGL 2</title>

 <style type="text/css">
 canvas {
 border: 5px dotted blue;
 }
 </style>
</head>
<body>

 <canvas id="webgl-canvas" width="800" height="600">
 Your browser does not support the HTML5 canvas element.
 </canvas>

</body>
</html>
```
